channel.title: [PI] Clipped NPCs still walk through walls?
channel.description:
Okay so I followed the tutorials and didn't miss any steps that I could do. Can anyone hope aboard teamviewer and help me figure this out?
skype: br33zyhf

item.title: [PI] Clipped NPCs still walk through walls?
item.dc:creator: @Naseem Naseem
item.description:
@Naseem wrote:

clipping at random movement that what you meant i guess, If so you need to open up your NpcHandler class and below every:

npcs[i].getNextNPCMovement(i);

Add:

handleClipping(i);

Read full topic
item.source: [PI] Clipped NPCs still walk through walls?
